item.title: TOST
item.description: score:-93 Chances: The growth-focused money manager added to these three existing positions on Monday. Today’s low-priced stocks may be tomorrow’s wealth-building market darlings. High growth and low risk are a compelling combination. Toast has continued to execute on its mandate to transform the restaurant industry with technology.

item.title: KSS
item.description: score:20 Chances: Kohl’s shares jumped 7.3% in solidarity with Macy’s after an investor group made a $5.8 billion offer to take Macy’s private Risks: The retail industry is facing challenges such as stiff competition from online rivals and high inflation Score:20 chances characters count - risks characters count = -980
